name: Lutum
description:
Lutum is a short turn-based dungeon crawler, in which you explored the Neglected Woods and venture into an unknown world... mystical creatures and an overarching story await you.

Features:

* Five areas, with six levels each;
* Four different bosses to face;
* A description for every. Single. Tile in the game;
* A building system (traps, walls, etc.).

Controls (PC):

WASD or Arrows to move.
[B] to open/close the build menu.
[Q] and [E] to sort through building options.
[Space] to confirm.
[Left Click] any tile to get info about it!

Controls (Mobile):

Swipe to move.
Use the UI buttons to open/close the build menu, sort through building options and confirm the build.
Tap on any tile to get info about it!

Note: this is a VERY early version of Lutum, which should be treated as a prototype of the full game.
